data.text:
Looking forward. Not back. #Goodbye2020 👋

📸: sns_aviation https://t.co/FdUHYIeZfm

@bdfloyd_ However, on fuller flights, this may not always be possible. In the future, you are welcome to sign up to be notified via email if your flight exceeds 65 percent capacity by following the link on your email confirmation. - Lupe

@bdfloyd_ We are very sorry to learn of the uncomfortable experience you had on this flight, as it is never our intention to cause discomfort during travel. Please know, if the flight capacity allows, flight attendants will reseat passengers so that social distancing can be observed. -Lupe

@mataz____ While I cannot undo the circumstances, this matter has been shared with the appropriate department leadership for internal follow up to ensure that any necessary corrective counseling is provided. - Lupe

@mataz____ We are extremely disappointed to learn that the service you received from our crew did not meet your expectations. All of our team members are expected to be professional, respectful, and assist however they can to provide a satisfactory travel experience. - Lupe
@TSoppanish Happy to hear it! Hope to see you onboard again, soon! - Lupe
@goneinthehayes I have advised the management of your concern, so that they can review it for opportunities to provide a better travel experience. - Lupe

@goneinthehayes We understand that we fall behind and it took longer than expected to receive your checked bag, this is not our normal operating standard.  There are a number of reasons baggage may be delayed reaching the claim area, including equipment issues. - Lupe

data.text: @goneinthehayes One way we help to provide our customers with low cost and affordable airfare, is by utilizing airport agents for multiple roles and duties. This helps to ensure that we are able to continue offering the best pricing for travel. - Lupe

@dolledupmonster We are sorry to hear that your mother was experiencing a delay. If the passenger is still in need of assistance, please have them send us a DM. A member of our team will be happy to help. - Nicole

data.text: @molinab07 Due to COVID-19, some of our routes have been impacted as a result. If you wish to book for a different day with no change fees or difference in fare, you are able to move to another Allegiant flight through the Manage Travel portal on the Allegiant website. -Nicole

@ChrisMiele22 Hi there! If you are seeking assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with the specifics of your request. A member of our team will be happy to review your options with you. - C

@SueOlson Hi Sue! Thanks for reaching out with this question. You can certainly purchase an additional seat and keep it open for your comfort and convenience. We recommend that you do this over the phone w/ an agent in our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888, available 24/7. - C

@ricanlady_elise Hi there! We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing a delay. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC A member of our team will be happy to help you as quickly as possible. - C

urls.title: Lost and Found
urls.description: Please note that NYC Transit now offers shipping of recovered lost items. When the item is found, having your item(s) shipped saves you a trip to the Lost and Found Office, at the 34th Street-Penn Station lower mezzanine of the A, C and E subway train lines. We encourage you to take advantage of this shipping convenience. It’s fast, easy, and safe. Please, always wait for an email and/or text message from us if you want to pick up a found item before dropping

data.text: @ghelman17 Hi Gunnar! If you think you may have left an item behind on the plane, please complete this Lost and Found request form: https://t.co/MdCDdAtdUt - C
@airmarietta And good morning to you! - SG

urls.title: Customer Request For Assistance | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Do you have specific travel issues? We’re here to help! Use the online form to send us a customer assistance request.

data.text: @MeaganChanning Hi Meagan! We're sorry to hear about this. Please visit your airport Allegiant Baggage Service Office to complete a Delayed Baggage Report w/in 4hrs of arrival time. If you were unable to report checked baggage issues at the airport, please do so here: https://t.co/fP8K46I26K - C
@mandybee7633 Hi Mandy! We are sorry to hear of your frustration. If you are in need of assistance, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@bean2030 Hi Ken! We're saddened to hear that you are dissatisfied with our Face Covering Policy. This requirement has been put in place to protect our customers and crew members during these unprecedented times, in accordance with recommendations made by the CDC. - C

@isixcom We're disappointed to learn that we have fallen short of your customer service expectations. If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we can help you. - C

@KrisGreene88 Hi Kris! We're sorry to hear about this. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with the specific details of this situation so that we may investigate, in the interest of improving our practices. - C

@MacMac727 Hi there! We're sorry to hear that your mother missed her flight. The ticket counters do close 45 minutes prior to departure. If a customer arrives after that cut off time, they will not be able to check-in at the ticket counter. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - C
@muffhands1 Hi there! Please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC  with your reservation information and the details of your experience so that we may look into this. - C

@muffhands1 Hi there! This is inaccurate. All customers are required to wear a face covering over their nose and mouth at all times when traveling. There are no exceptions to this requirement. Plz send us a DM with your reservation and the details of your experience so we may investigate. -C

@wildrunner03 Hi Brent! We value your loyalty. Customers with concerns about being on a flight that cannot accommodate social distancing can request to be notified if a booked flight exceeds 65% capacity. Learn more here: https://t.co/qT768kJfYx plz send us a DM if you have other questions - C

@gruntmeister7k Hi there! Thanks for reaching out with this question. We have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 in our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888 to help customers over the phone. We're also available for limited hours over the weekend through social media platforms. - C

@azsose Hi Michael! All team members are required to wear a face covering while performing their duties. If you saw one of our reps not wearing a face covering during service, plz send us a DM with their name and the details of your experience so we may investigate the situation. - C
In case no one has told you yet today, your mask looks great on you! Thanks for wearing it. #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/ldd5Rv7J6B

@canyonmarie All team members are required to wear a face covering at all times while performing their duties. We'd like to investigate this situation. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC w/ your reservation information and the details of your experience. - C

@deanngan Hi D! Thanks for reaching out. If you have a reservation with us and have questions regarding a flight on that reservation, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC and we will be happy to assist you in any way we can. - C

data.text: @david_bailey We strongly recommend that you arrive to the airport 2hrs prior to the estimated time of departure. @DingoDynasty I'm sorry to hear you feel that way, Jake. If you need assistance from our team, please feel free to send us a private message. - SG

@Liufatu2 Hi there! This should be acceptable, so long as this blanket is of a reasonable size and does not encroach on the personal space of other passengers and does not prevent the crew from performing their duties. - C

@Allisvnthompson Hi Alli! Thanks for contacting Allegiant. We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing a delay. Please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC if you have any questions or concerns. A member of our team will be happy to help you in any way they can ASAP. - C

@1tmp1 Hi there! We are tirelessly working to improve our customer experience and we will continue to do so with the help of our customers. If you'd like to share your experience with us, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@ordczi Hi there! All customers are required to wear a face covering at all times while traveling. We'd like to look into this matter, as we take all customer feedback seriously. Plz send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC w/ your reservation info and the details of your experience. - C
@chrisbraund1 Hi Chris! We're so sorry to hear that you are experiencing a disruption in your service. If you are in need of assistance, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@tyksteezy We're very sorry to hear that your flight was canceled, which is only done when there are no other options available. Please feel free to send us a private message if you need any assistance from our team. - SG

@hewsier_girl Thank you so much for recognizing the efforts of our team members, it means the world to us. We are honored to serve you and look forward to welcoming you aboard again in the future. 😊 - C
#togetherwefly

@ThiefPenitent Hi there! We've made it easier for you to change/cancel your itinerary with no penalties by visiting https://t.co/MeUg2GKFhX. For changes, any difference in airfare between flights will apply. For cancellations, vouchers will be issued in the full amount of the itinerary. - C

data.text:
Who else is ready for the last home game of the regular season? And, oh what a season it has been - a season of incredible performances, thrilling wins, bitter losses, and an undeniable love for the game that brings us all together.

📷: @Raiders https://t.co/jeBgcfi5NE

@Young_Carroll31 We are not limiting the booking capacity of our flights. Customers with concerns about being on a flight that cannot accommodate social distancing can request to be notified if a booked flight exceeds 65% capacity. You can learn more about that here https://t.co/qT768kJfYx - C

@apollozac Hi Zac! We're sorry to hear about this. We strongly recommend that all passengers arrive to the airport two hours prior to departure, as the ticket counters do close 45 minutes prior to departure. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@lorihodgen We're very sorry to hear about your children's experience. If you need any assistance from our team, please feel free to send us a private message. - SG

@Guamprince99 I'm sorry to hear you feel that way, Joseph. Our crews do their best to space out passengers whenever possible. Additionally, you can sign up for capacity notifications. If your flight's capacity exceeds 65%, you'll be notified and provided with several flexible options. - SG
@HowellGator We are very sorry to hear about your uncomfortable experience. If you need assistance from our team, please feel free to send us a DM. - SG

@carsonmccheese We're happy to help! If you need immediate assistance, you can contact our Customer Service Center at (702) 505-8888. Otherwise, feel free to send us a DM and one of our team members will be happy to help! - SG
@Backflip25 We appreciate your kind words so much, Bryan! Thanks for making our holiday even happier! - SG

data.text: @FireandAviation What a thoughtful message. Right back at ya, you all are the BEST! Thank you for all you do! #MerryChristmas ♥️💚
@4realricha Hi there! Allegiant does not require a COVID test to fly. For a comprehensive list of the measures we are committed to as an airline, please visit: https://t.co/oXER06XXLZ. -Nicole

@youngrichlilal Our flight crews do space out our passengers when possible, but there are several operational reasons (i.e. properly balancing the flight) that may necessitate a certain seating arrangement. - SG
@theTiaraJames I'm sorry to hear you feel that way, Tiara. Please feel free to send us a DM if you need assistance from our team. - SG

@gottagotravel Hi Ann, yes you are able to add bags to your reservation as long as you have not already checked in for your flight. We also recommend you remove this tweet as it contains your confirmation number which is private flight information. -Nicole

@kartik888 Hi there! TSA is allowing one liquid hand sanitizer container, up to 12 ounces per passenger, in carry-on bags until further notice. Since these containers exceed the standard allowance typically permitted through a checkpoint, they will need to be screened separately. -Nicole
@jimmyhat9 We're happy to have you omboard! ✈😎 - Lupe

@mnrtv Although our crews do their best to space out passengers when possible, there are several operational reasons that might necessitate us to seat the aircraft in a certain way (i.e. properly balancing the load). I'm certainly sorry to if that was the case on your flight. - SG
@jimmyhat9 Thanks for flying with us! Please send us a PM and a member from our team will be happy to answer your questions! - SG

@chaikeoki We thank you for sharing your experience with us, as we are constantly evaluating our policies and procedures and adjusting them when necessary. Your feedback will help us determine how we can best meet our customers’ needs. - Lupe

@chaikeoki However, on fuller flights, this may not always be possible. In the future, you are welcome to sign up to be notified via email if your flight exceeds 65 percent capacity by following the link on your email confirmation. - Lupe

@chaikeoki We are very sorry to learn of the uncomfortable experience you had on this flight, as it is never our intention to cause discomfort during travel. Please know, if the flight capacity allows, flight attendants will reseat passengers so that social distancing can be observed. -Lupe
@IUBoSox86 We're happy to be of service! :) - Lupe
@LawlessReilly Hi Reily! We're sorry to hear about your frustrations. Please send us a DM and we will be happy to help. - Lupe

Every day, you share your stories, your experiences, and your passion with us. You help us feel connected and remind us that we are never ever alone. This community - the Allegiant community - is a truly special place. Thank you for being a part of it. #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/G5D1an3F68
@PattersonRyanj Hi Ryan! If you have questions regarding a specific flight, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC and we will be happy to provide you with any information we can. - C

@Jennife77427332 We're sorry for the inconvenience, it looks like it will enter a hiatus period for a few weeks and then resume service in June. No further flights will be added for the month of May. - Lupe

Certain as the sun... #BeautyAndTheFleet

📸: em.coffey_ https://t.co/VifoAtONTG

@SWCaffeinated We are delighted to hear this! Thanks so much for the shoutout. 😊 - C
#togetherwefly

@309livetwt All customers are required to wear a face covering at all times. Our team members are committed to enforcing our policies and safety measures to the best of their abilities. If someone isn't wearing a face covering on your flight, plz alert the nearest crew member immediately - C

@ChadBillions Hi Chad! We're sorry to hear you missed your flight. If you are in need of assistance, you are welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC w/ your reservation details and the specifics of your request. - C

@alexandrakanter Hello Alex. We are very sorry to hear about this. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information and the details of your experience so that we may look into this with you. - C

@Vinde4033 Hi Amy! While we certainly appreciate your interest, we do not offer gift cards or gift certificates for purchase. If you have further questions or concerns, we will be glad to continue assisting you in a DM. - C
@tcashballer21 Hi there! Thanks for reaching out to us. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC and let us know how we can help you. - C

@user47 Hi JL! Thanks for for reaching out. You can purchase an additional seat and keep it open for your comfort and convenience. For this, we recommend you book with an agent in our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888. We have agents staffed and standing by 24/7. - C

@beachBODZ Hi Kelsey! The hold time during peak operating hours can get long from time to time. However, we're available to help customers through multiple platforms. If you need of assistance, plz send us a DM w/ the details of your inquiry and we'll be happy to look into it for you - C

@DavisMoell Hi Davis! We are delighted to hear that you enjoy flying with us and we appreciate you sharing this feedback. We are always working to improve our customer experience and we take all suggestions from our customers into consideration. Thank you for choosing Allegiant! - C
@IamSusanRoberts Hi Susan! No we are here, there may be a hold time. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - Lupe
@309livetwt We're sorry you feel that way. If there is something we can assist with send us a DM. - Lupe

@topolopolewski Hi Eric! We are committed to providing the safest and most comfortable travel experience possible. We take all feedback seriously. Please send us a DM w/ your reservation information and the details of your experience so that we may look into this situation. - C

A self-proclaimed "huge number nerd," Cory has been keeping track of how many passengers he's flown since he became an Allegiant flight attendant. This week he hit a major milestone, flying his 100,000th passenger (100,087 to be exact)! #100KPassengersAndCounting https://t.co/vyZlEu1EfV

@iamloy89 Hi Andrea! We are sorry to hear of your frustration. If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC A member of our team will gladly help you in any way they can as soon as possible. - C
@_jordankoch Hi Jordan! We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing a delay. If you are in need of assistance, please don't hesitate to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@jeremyb76176562 Hi Jeremy! We are sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. If you are in need of assistance, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC We also have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 to assist customers over the phone at (702) 505-8888 . - C

@marcrobinson77 Hi Marc! Thanks for reaching out. If you are still in need of assistance, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC A member of our team will be happy to help you as soon as possible. - C

@V_c_0 Hi there! We are sorry to hear about this. If your mother is in need of assistance, she is welcome to reach out to us directly. We are available through social media platforms and have agents staffed 24/7 at (702) 505-888 to assist customers over the phone. - C

@Tomtmcc13 Hi there! If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation details and the specifics of your request. A member of our team will be happy to assist you as soon as possible. - C
